Title: Fan
Writer: Maneesh Sharma (story), Habib Faisal (screenplay), Habib Faisal (dialogue), Sharat Katariya (dialogue)
Actors: Shah Rukh Khan, Sayani Gupta, Puja Panchkoty, Deepika Amin
Plot: Gaurav's world revolves around the superstar Aryan Khanna. What happens when his passion turns into a dangerous obsession that crosses the fine line?
